title: OMG this book sucks
entry: I can't believe I took the time to read this book. The plot is atrocious and the characters have no development or depth at all. Never reading this again...

title: Thoughts on green eggs and ham
entry: I do not know how trustworthy green eggs could be. While yes, it could be food coloring, it could also be very rotten eggs. They could even be mutated! I would definitely be skeptical as well.

title: Can I just be surrounded by books?
entry: I am so done with being a productive member of society. I just want to have a little library in the middle of a forest away from everyone else and drink my tea in peace. That sounds like the dream!
